findings.title: PVE-003: Meaningful Events For Important States Change
findings.description: In `Ethereum`, events are used to record runtime dynamics and store arguments passed in transaction logs accessible to external analytics and reporting tools. In the `PoolImplementation` contract, certain events reflecting market changes are not properly emitted.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Deri-V3 protocol, there is a special administrative account, i.e., admin, which plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations. With great privilege comes great responsibility.

findings.title: Removal of Unused State/Code
findings.description: Unused code or unnecessary redundancies can be safely removed from the `PoolImplementation` contract, such as the state `tokenWETH` which is only used in the constructor.
